title: Piggy Burgers
directions: Preheat grill to 350° to 400° (medium-high) heat. Combine first 3 ingredients. Gently shape mixture into 4 (4-inch) patties.
Grill patties, covered with grill lid, 5 minutes on each side or until pork is no longer pink. Serve on buns with desired toppings.
Note: We tested with McCormick Grill Mates Molasses Bacon Seasoning.
ingredients: 4 thick bacon slices, cooked and crumbled $Click to see savings
4 hamburger buns, toasted $Click to see savings
Toppings: Onion-Spiked Pickles, bottled barbecue sauce
